events.name: JPY Bank of Japan Policy Meeting
EUR ECB Monetary Policy Press Conference

analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS score 37 maintains a Defensive regime. Flat momentum pushed the score to 37 as the DXY (Dollar strength) rises to 97.08, tightening global liquidity. High VIX (Market fear) at 20.69 reflects equity volatility ahead of CPI data. However, the rise in Gold and Bitcoin suggests a decoupling and shift toward hard assets despite broad market de-risking. Maintain a cautious stance until inflation clarity emerges, as high yields continue to pressure valuation multiples.

reports.EN: GMS score 37 maintains a Defensive regime. Flat momentum pushed the score to 37 as the DXY (Dollar strength) rises to 97.08, tightening global liquidity. High VIX (Market fear) at 20.69 reflects equity volatility ahead of CPI data. However, the rise in Gold and Bitcoin suggests a decoupling and shift toward hard assets despite broad market de-risking. Maintain a cautious stance until inflation clarity emerges, as high yields continue to pressure valuation multiples.
reports.ES: El puntaje GMS de 37 mantiene un rÃ©gimen Defensivo. Un impulso plano situÃ³ el puntaje en 37 mientras el DXY (fuerza del dÃ³lar) sube a 97.08, restringiendo la liquidez global. El VIX (miedo del mercado) en 20.69 refleja la volatilidad de las acciones antes de los datos del IPC. No obstante, el alza en Oro y Bitcoin sugiere una rotaciÃ³n hacia activos refugio pese al desapalancamiento general del mercado. Se recomienda cautela operativa hasta obtener mayor claridad sobre la inflaciÃ³n.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 37 mempertahankan rezim Defensif. Momentum yang datar menahan skor di 37 saat DXY (kekuatan Dolar) naik ke 97,08, memperketat likuiditas global. VIX (indeks ketakutan) pada 20,69 mencerminkan volatilitas saham menjelang data CPI. Namun, kenaikan Emas dan Bitcoin menunjukkan pergeseran ke aset keras meskipun terjadi de-risking pasar secara luas. Tetap waspada hingga ada kejelasan mengenai data inflasi mendatang dan pantau potensi pembalikan arus likuiditas.

reports.DE: Ein GMS-Score von 37 bestÃ¤tigt das defensive Regime. Das flache Momentum hielt den Score bei 37, wÃ¤hrend der DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke) auf 97,08 stieg und die globale LiquiditÃ¤t einschrÃ¤nkte. Der VIX (Angstindex) spiegelt bei 20,69 die VolatilitÃ¤t vor den CPI-Daten wider. Doch der Anstieg von Gold und Bitcoin deutet auf eine Flucht in Sachwerte hin, obwohl der Gesamtmarkt de-riskt. Vorsicht bleibt geboten, bis Klarheit Ã¼ber die Inflation herrscht und sich die Marktbreite stabilisiert.
reports.FR: Le score GMS de 37 maintient un rÃ©gime DÃ©fensif. L'Ã©lan stagnant a maintenu le score Ã  37 alors que le DXY (force du dollar) atteint 97,08, resserrant la liquiditÃ© mondiale. Le VIX (indice de peur) Ã  20,69 reflÃ¨te la volatilitÃ© des actions avant la publication de l'IPC. Cependant, la hausse de l'or et du Bitcoin suggÃ¨re un pivot vers les actifs tangibles malgrÃ© le dÃ©sendettement global du marchÃ©. Maintenez la prudence jusqu'Ã  la clarification des donnÃ©es sur l'inflation.
